description: Manage an Application Insights component billing features.

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component billing show
commands.summary: Show the billing features of an Application Insights resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component billing show [--app]
                                               [--ids]
                                               [--resource-group]
                                               [--subscription]
examples: az monitor app-insights component billing show --app demoApp -g demoRg

commands.name: az monitor app-insights component billing update
commands.summary: Update the billing features of an Application Insights resource.
commands.syntax:
az monitor app-insights component billing update [--add]
                                                 [--app]
                                                 [--cap]
                                                 [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--ids]
                                                 [--remove]
                                                 [--resource-group]
                                                 [--set]
                                                 [--stop {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                 [--subscription]
